name: vessel-state
description: Takes a stream of data and decodes it into a reactive Vuex store for use in Vue components.

scripts.pub: yarn run clean && yarn run build && yarn publish
scripts.pub:beta: yarn run clean && yarn run build && yarn publish --tag beta
scripts.test: cross-env TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true NODE_ENV=test mocha --ui bdd --recursive --require ts-node/register test/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:watch: yarn run test --watch --watch-extensions ts --watch-files src,test --reporter min
